all_text_timv: Herodotus. History. Latin & Greek Hērodotou Halikarnassēos Historiōn logoi th ́epigraphomenoi Mousai. Tou autou exēgēsis peri tēs Homērou biotēs = Herodoti Halicarnassei Historiarum libri IX, novem Musarum nominibus inscripti. Ejusdem narratio de vita Homeri. Excerpta è Ctesiae libris de rebus Persicis & Indicis. Graecè & Latiné. Et H. Stephani Apologia pro Herodoto. Accesserunt huic editioni chronologia historiae, & tabula geographiae Herodoteae ; necnon variantes lectiones, & notae ex pluribus mss. codd. & antiquis scriptoribus collectae ; unà cum indice Graeco & Latino. Herodoti Halicarnassei Historiarum libri IX Londini : Typis E. Horton & J. Grover, impensis Johannis Dunmore, Richardi Chiswel, Benjamin Tooke, & Thomae Sawbridge, 1679. [68], 708, [36], 33, [49] pages, [1] leaf of plates : folded map ; 34 cm (fol.) text txt rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier Title romanized. Greek and Latin in parallel columns. Dedication signed: Tho. Gale. Translated by L. Valla, revised by H. Stephani, cf. BN. Map engraved by F. Lamb. Based on the 1608 edition by Gottfried Jungermann, cf. Grässe. Signatures: a² b-i⁴ A-3N⁶ 3O-3Q⁴ 3R-3T² 3X-4E² 4F²( -4F₂) k² 3U⁴ *-9*². Initials; head- and tail-pieces. Map: Tabula geographica ad Herodotum illustrandum concin[n]ata. Includes indexes. [the 9 histories] -- Narratio de vita Homeri -- Excerpta e Ctesiae libris de rebus Persicis & Indicis -- Apologia pro Herodoto / H. Stephan -- Chronologia historiae, & tabula geographiae Herodoteae; necnon variantes lectiones, & notae -- Indice Graeco & Latino. Chiswell, Richard, publisher. Tooke, Benjamin, -1716, publisher. Sawbridge, Thomas, fl. 1669-1692, publisher. Estienne, Henri, 1531-1598. Apologia pro Herodoto. French. Ctesias. Indica. Selections.
